channel.title: [PI] Help ASAP [PI]
channel.description: How Do I Make It Where When You Kill Someone 2 Times In A Row It Gives You Both Points Instead Of Saying False Kill, Because Of Killing Them 2 Times In A Row, How Stop That? And Please Help Me With Finding The File To Edit The Amount Of Coins You Get From Thieving Items?? THANKS GUYS!!

item.title: [PI] Help ASAP [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“rash, post:2, topic:377796”]Why would you want that?
People will just cheat the point system[/quote]
Because I Don’t Got Many Players Yet It Just Opened And I Got 24/7 Staff Online So If Someone Is PkP Farming They Will 24 hour Ban Them Sooooo, I Was Looking I Found The Other one By My Self 2min Ago Lol, Where Do I Change This PkP Point Thing And Also What File Do I Change The Amount Of Coins From Your Thieving Stalls?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help ASAP [PI]

item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Abandoned Dreams, post:1, topic:377796”]How Do I Make It Where When You Kill Someone 2 Times In A Row It Gives You Both Points Instead Of Saying False Kill, Because Of Killing Them 2 Times In A Row, How Stop That?
And Make It Where Admins Lose Items Also.[/quote]

Why would you want that?
People will just cheat the point system

second, admins can drop items, is in config class
